topics.body:
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cacfca63687242d6f40b00#post_54cacfca63687242d6f40b00
I'm just using this as a excuse to post Touhou, but here's something cool also:
!http://simg3.gelbooru.com//images/9c/2a/9c2ae3a83d38e11d812dc74b07c46b7b.gif?2379663!
Live2d looks nothing more than simply a cool trinket of a toy, but when you get down to it they're working on being able to convert 2d into 3d models.  Basically imagine in five years you being able to directly convert 2d character concept art into 3d game models and such.

topics.body:
Before I die, I want to take a ride aboard this amazing locomotive at least once during its steam excusions. Bonus points if I get the chance to ride aboard inside the cab...somehow!

Behold! Southern Pacific 4449, GS-4 class steam locomotive:
!http://www.railpictures.net/images/d1/1/8/7/7187.1248805406.jpg!
